page.title: 08Education - Winchfield Area
page.content: Many children in the block go to private schools. The state schools for the Winchfield area are{Oakwood (Infants) &{Greenfields}(Junior) at Hartley Wintney & either{Robert Mays (Odiham) or{Yateley Comprehensive schools. Children from {Dogmersfield {C/E School}go to{Calthorpe Park {Comprehensive Sch.}within the block.This school has 1030 11-16 year olds on roll & also takes children from{All Saints C/E Junior School}next door which currently has 313 7-11 year olds on roll.{Tavistock County Infants {Sch.}(5-7 years) also falls within the block & currently has 92 on roll. {Dogmersfield C/E}is a primary school catering for 42 5-11 year olds at present. This village school still keeps the 'May Day' tradition & has linked with 4 other village schools to share sports facilities & resources.
